activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Zaɓi kalmar fassarar don shiga tare da.
Fassara mai sauƙi wanda ya ƙunshi wasu kalmomi da za ku iya tunawa da sauƙi.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Zabi mai kyau izinin magana a kare asusunka. Duba shawarwari don wasu ra'ayoyi.
activate.IfYouFeel: Idan kun ji wani abu ya ɓace, za ku iya

authorize.TermsLabel:
Na karanta kuma in yarda
zuwa {{link}}
authorize.mustAgree: Da farko dole ne ku yarda da sharuɗɗan.

notifications.title: Izinin
notifications.prompt: Shin kuna son taimaka wa sanarwarku? Za ku sami ƙarin ɗaukakawa na ainihi game da abubuwan da kuke damu.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Barka da zuwa! Da fatan a tabbatar da adireshin imel naka.
notifications.WelcomeVerifyEmail: Barka da zuwa! Tabbatar da adireshin imel naka.
notifications.ForgetPass: Hey, baku manta da fasfonku ba?
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: Kun gama kunnawa mai amfani. Gwada shiga yanzu.

invalidLanguageSelected: Harshen mara inganci da aka zaɓa

login.title: Maraba
login.directionsNoRegister: Shiga ciki idan kuna da asusu.
login.resendConfirm: Kuna so ku aika da sako don sake saita kalmar wucewar ku?
login.resendSuccess: Bincika saƙo don sake saita kalmar wucewa
login.noPassphrase: Kafin ka iya shiga, dole ne ka saita jumlar wucewa ta danna hanyar haɗi a cikin sakon kunnawa.
login.notVerified: Dole ne ku aika da kanku saƙo na kunnawa don shiga.
login.emailExists: Shin kun yi kokarin yin rijista da wannan imel din? Idan haka ne, bincika akwatin saƙo mai shiga don kunna asusunka. Danna don sake aika saƙon
login.mobileExists: Shin kun yi kokarin yin rijista da wannan lambar wayar a gabani? Idan haka ne, duba SMS don kunna asusunka. Danna don sake aika saƙon
login.facebookNoEmail: Adireshin facebook naku ya rasa adireshin imel da aka tabbatar. Kawai shiga cikin asalin ƙasar.
login.picTooltip: Kuna iya canza wannan hoto nan gaba

alert.title: Canza hanya zuwa Wallet
alert.content: Da zarar kun rufe wannan zancen, za a kai ku zuwa walat ɗin ku. Bayan ka shiga, koma wannan shafin.

placeholders.identifier: shigar da # ta hannu ko kuma imel

prompt.title: Account {{Platform}}
prompt.noLongerUsing: Ba a haɗa ku da {{platform}} kamar
prompt.doAuth: Shiga ciki tare da wannan asusun
